name: Banana Scaler
tagline: Wanna "Banana for Scale"? We have an option for you!
body:
### Draw on pictures with bananas, for scaling purpose. 
A simple app that helps user to draw banana on any images they like, to testify what can humans do with their mobile devices, as well as jumping on the bandwagon of [Banana for Scale](http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/banana-for-scale) as quickly as possible.

### Features
- Draw banana on any pictures captured from a camera
- Draw banana on any pictures accessed from a gallery
- Easy Intersection: TAP to draw, HOLD to Save / Delete pictures

### Authors and Contributors
Kiu Fung Lam
Ka Hei Chan
Roger Tang

### Link for the app
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
